comments.body: sorry to come up with this at the last minute: can we create a `PhysicalWriteInfo` interface? In case we want to add more physical information in the future.

No problem! Since we still want to move forward with the interface-based approach, I've decided to evolve https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/25990/ to include both the `PhysicalWriteInfo` as well as `WriteInfo`
